lines.text: I've told you so many times. Don't just use D gear. Sometimes use 1st gear, or 2nd gear. I say brake, you don't. I say step on it, you don't. I say ease off the pedal, you don't. You're so stupid!
Did I make you waste your tears over me?
I want to live somewhere peaceful, that isn't at war.
Iraq? There's no war in Iraq. Or go to heaven, they have clean air!
We're always travelling. We should look for somewhere to call home.
Brother James, don't say things like that.
There are very old mountains and rivers, heroes don't seek a place to rest, people won't always be dancing on stage, and trends will be blown away by the wind and rain.
